item.title: [DISTRELEC-4967] Export of education registration is not working proberly
item.description:
The export of education registration is not working proberly.

  • File is created at "/env-hp-p/inout/misc/education_registrations/export"

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

Do we have to trigger the export manually?
I configured a trigger on HP-P to run the export on a daily basis @ 6:00 AM

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4933] random 404 error in "Similar products" section
item.description:
When trying to click on one of the similar products on a product detail page (coming via both search and navigation), I randomly end up with a 404 error.

E.g. being on http://www.distrelec.ch/de/ZigBee-Modul-Digi-XBP24-AWI-001J/p/17303846?q=*&filter_Buyable=1&filter_Category3=ZigBee%E2%84%A2&page=2&origPageSize=10&simi=99.8 and clicking on the first similar product (590002), I end up here: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/ZigBee-Modul-Digi-XBP24-AWI-001J/p/undefined

It's not always possible to reproduce it, as it's quite random. On one click it works, the next it does not - throughout the entire assortment. I tested it on my private notebook, too, and there I get the error less, but still every now and then.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
@Jan: Ich glaube das ist das selbe Problem, dass wir schon auf der SearchResultPage hatten. Ich glaube wir müssen warten, bis die liste vollständige geladen ist, bevor der Benutzer eines der Listenobjekte auswählen kann. Nachstellen kannst du es, in dem du die "Ähnlichen Produkte" lädst und dann gleich auf einen Eintrag in der Liste klickst.
Bevor du dann den fix einchecken würdest, melde dich kurz bei mir, weil ich denke wir werden das in einen Hotfix Branch einchecken, damit wir das heute Abend mit ins Live-Deployment nehmen können. Wenn du willst, kannst du natürlich gerne schon vorher auf den Branch v2.0.24 wechseln (https://svn.namics.com/Distrelec/Distrelec-Relaunch-2012-intern/branches/v2.0.24)

Seems that it works correctly if you click on the image or the name of the product, but the link that is opened from a click anywhere in the text / attributes area of the line item leads to the "undefined" page.

Hi All,

The problem was, that the product url was missing on the detail page product list and also on BOM / Favorite / Shopping lists..

I fixed it. Can be tested after the next deployment.

BR Jan
Tested on Q - Works.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4760] IE // Kompatibilitätsmodus
item.description:
IE9/IE11
Our OCI customers need to have an active "Kompatibilitätsmodus" for their SAP application.
Our web shop is having a lot of design issues in this Mode and the customers cannot buy.

I had a screen share tour with our customer "Roche".
Attached the images.
Please optimize the web shop on the following pages based on the compatibility mode.

  • Header
    • Search field & suggest layer
    • Meta Nav
    • Main Nav
    • Breadcrump
  • Article detail page
    • Buying section
    • price scales section
  • Cart
    • Checkout Button
    • Whole item table
    • Price section
  • Search
    • Search result list position
    • Image positions
    • Search result list tables

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: New Screenshots from Roche

I fixed all the designbugs regarding the attached screenshots and some more.

Also I was able to fix the remaining issues, that we talked on the phone yesterday (Product List after ajax actions, Main Nav Flyout).

After the next live deployment, please check back with your customer, if some more adjustments are required.

BR Jan

Customer is testing this.
We can go live anyway.

comments.comment:
The visibility of the scrollbars depends on the system settings, see attached screenshot.
Possibly they can be enforced?

To be tested in a Mac computer after the next Q deployment.
(I can test it)
Please test, thanks.
Tested OK in Safari, Mac

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4371] Zero result page adjustment
item.description:
As discussed in the end of February, we need to get a different zero result page. Still, no changes happened.

The structure should be as follows:

• Title as today (No results found…)
• A subtitle/descriptive line with tips for searching
• The search box once again, with different CTA text in it (if possible)
• A subtitle as introduction for the feedback form
• The feedback form, sending requests to the customer service of the respective country

There is a rough draft attached to get an idea how we would like to have it.

(DISTSEARCH-68 http://198.18.7.87/browse/DISTSEARCH-68?filter=-2)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attached the translations for the modification of the page.

Hi Daniela,

There are one question and one assumption on this task, which I want to ask you :-
1. The search box on the gui in the canter air is just a text input box not like the full functional search box like we have on the top left side which has suggestion feature and all.
2. Suggestion or recommendation box on the bottom
a. What will be the criteria for making suggestion ?
Because the name of the product or search team for which the such was done was wrong that's why he landed on this page.
3. Text just bellow the red light colour Starting with Tipp: will it be change time and again for example via cms

Hi Neeraj

1. What do you mean with "just text input"? That the suggest is not popping up? If yes, it would be great if at least the query suggest could be activated in this box.
2. The suggestions will be campaigns out of FACT-Finder with some hand-picked products or some business rules (e.g. selection of new products, etc). So they do not have to be connected to the search term, but they should be maintained via campaigns or CMS.
3. The Tipp is currently not meant to change.

Does this answer your questions?

Hi Daniela,

Yes. We have started the development now.

Hi Florian,

The development has been done on this task. But we need support from some frontend engginer so that he can arrange the zero result page with the mock attached with the task.

Can you assign it to some front end engginer and let him to adjust the page looks like mock or I can explain it to him.

Thanks
The name of the page is called searchEmptyPage.jsp which needs to be adjusted.

Front end work done.
Thanks
Ruben

Hi Ruben,
Could you please align it more to the mockup in terms of font-color and spacing. Thanks.
Hi Ruben, the spacing should be like in the mockup - please adjust. thanks.
spacing OK, please verify

Hi Ruben,
Is there a new fix version?
Where should we check this?
to be checked in the next Q deployment: v2.0.25

Hi Daniela, the last modification will be on Q next Tuesday.
Is this okay?
Yep, it's ok. Will check it then.
Translations will follow as soon as we're able to import properties again.

comments.comment:
Hi Ruben,
When you have added a item into the basket, there will be more icon where we need a alt tag.
Could you please check this as well?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3769] ServicePlus Modification: Adaptation of FactFinder Config & Search Result Page
item.description:
As discussed we should implement two additional improvments for service plus:

1. The search engine should first search through the service plus assortment for exact matches. After that it should search in both assortments.

2. If there isn't any exact match in the normal assortment and we found some possible matches in the service plus assortment we should show a link (e.g. "2 service plus items found") on the normal search result page. The link should lead to a service plus search result page.

Search result site: (Screenshot 2)

  • Change the breadcrump
  • Add a static title "Sie suchten nach Service+ Artikel"
  • Remove the filters
  • Replace the search result list
  • modify the product information to the existing data
item.summary: ServicePlus Modification: Adaptation of FactFinder Config & Search Result Page

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Here's the discussed additional version of the search result design.

1. please set up the search modification with FF --> Raphael Husi
2. Test it
3. We'll make the decision regarding design. => DISTRELEC-4362

We try the following solution:

  • A search is always be done in both index.
  • If something has been found in the Service+ a virtual facet will be generated by FactFinder and the products get added to the end of the product result list.
  • If somebody selects the Service+ facet, just the Service+ products are shown and all other facets will disappear.
  • The additional Service+ facet becomes highlighted with a light blue background color.
  • (Optional) Also the Service+ products in the product result list gets highlighted with a light blue background color, so that the customer can see the relation between the facet and the Service+ products and also that he recognize that this products are not part of the normal product assortment.

Hi Raphi,
As discussed please remove the toggles on the search result list for this items.

@Jan: Ist drin. Wenn du mir das Styling und die Javascript-Funktionalitäten noch machen könntest wäre super. Achtung das <span class="nr"> ist in der spring Message drin, wie auch der Link. Ich habe die CSS-Klasse mal "nr-serviceplus" genannt. Wenn da was nicht passen sollte, dann einfach anpassen.

@Raphi: Can there be the case, that on pageload, there is no Service Plus Result, but throughout selecting any combination of facets, suddendly, there is a service plus result?

In that case, I always need the element on page, but just hidden on page load..

==> I already found that edge case..I will implement it so that it is covered..

I checked in my part..

does only the CH Site have this functionality or do we have to add the message properties also for the other contries?
Thanks Jan. No we have to translate the values also for the other sites. Florian is taking care of that.

Please forward the following property for translation:

search.page.totalServicePlusResults = , davon <a href="{1}" title="Service+"><span class="nr-service-plus">{0}</span></a> aus unserem Sonderbeschaffungssortiment

FR: xxx Produits correspondants, dont x dans notre assortiment spécial
LT : xxx produktų rasta. Tarp jų - x produktų iš užsakomų prekių asortimento
ENG: xxx products found - including x from our Special Procurement Assortment
ITA: xxx Prodotti trovati, inclusi x da assortimento special

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4954] Fix wrong ReplacementReason code
item.description:
The code given from ELFA was wrong. Should be "O" instead of "Ö".
Since no product has been assigned with this code, no migration is necessary.

  • Add new code to erp-codelists.impex
  • remove existing wrong code by a "post installation instruction".

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Assigning to nabil as he will deploy tonight.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4899] B2B Keyaccount Checkut Address Page clear selected Shipping address
item.description:
As of now, if a B2B Key Account User has multiple Billing addresses and selects one of them, a shipping address gets pre selected.

When after that he changes his billing address again, the previously set shipping address id gets cleared out in the hidden text field, the shipping address stays selected visually.

Make it so, that it also gets cleared visually so the user gets forced to select a shipping address again.

Also refactor the checkout address section to have 2 skins for normal b2b and b2b keyaccount.
item.summary: B2B Keyaccount Checkut Address Page clear selected Shipping address

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
In discussion with Nando, we decided to keep the last selected shipping address, when the user selects a different billing address, as it already was visually done.

The refactoring is done.
Hi Jan, do you have a b2b-keyaccount for me to test on Q?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3218] Additional Event-Tracking of Clicks on Teaser-Tracking Elements
item.description:
For all Webtrekk Teaser-Tracking implementations (compare WT-Spec chapter 9) the following functional amendment (Event-Tracking – compare WT-Spec chapter 8.2 p. 18/19) is required regarding click-event on any teaser-elements:

"onclick=wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'[[Teaser-Tracking ID]]',sendOnUnload:1}

);"

Thereby two Webtrekk-requests are fired when a user is clicking on any teaser-element.

Briefly pre-discussed the above requirements with Dominic Modalek via phone (12.2.14).

Thanks! Mark
item.summary: Additional Event-Tracking of Clicks on Teaser-Tracking Elements

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Estimate 3 Days Frontend Work. No Backend Work needed.

This change affects many different components and therefore needs some time to implement and test.
Reconsider after go-live of 1.1

Mark, I assign it to you until this will be reconsidered again.

Info: only track onClick, not on shifting to the left or right in a carousel.

Hi Florian

To be foreseen for v1.3 if possible.

Thx Mark
Could you please check with Dominic what it needs do be done?

Dominic,
can you do a rough effort estimation for planning?

I estimate 3 - 4 days for this change.

Mainly because there are so many different modules involved that must be changed and tested. See Chapter 8 https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation for an Overview.

Florian,
please evaluate the priority of this task (in the context of FE bugs, FF improvements and ELFA development)

Please allocate and assign accordingly.

Thx Mark

Implemented. See 9.3 Click on Teaser Items - Always activated:

https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation

Tested every occurence with a HTTP Sniffer and all IDs seem to be transmitted correctly. Only the "Feedback Campaign" Product Teaser could not be tested locally, so please don't forget to test it on the Q System.

@ Dominic -> Fix Version?

Thx Mark

Hi Dominic,

I have tested the implementation on distrelec.at. On the Homepage (Carpet) on click on a teaser-item two requests are transmitted (as required - compare attached screenshots): A request showing the click-event (ck524: 1) and another one transmitting the ct-parameter.
Please note that if the teaser is not containing a product, the image-name is so far not transmitted as part of the ct-parameter value (compare red arrow in screenshot).

Other Teaser-implementations such onsite-search overview (e.g. http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone) and 'Ähnliche Produkte' respectively 'Kunden, die diesen Artikel gekauft haben, kauften auch' (e.g. http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Office-2013-Professional-eng-Microsoft-269-16093/p/11063276) do onclick not transmitting a request containing a ct-parameter. Besides a request containing the click-event (ck524: 1) is not transmitted.

Please verify and refactor accordingly.

Bests, Mark

Hello Mark, we need some explanation regarding this ticket.

  • Why currently there is some webtrekk argument in the URL of the banner image here?: http://www.distrelec.at/search?q=iphone
    If you inspect the element you can find: &wt_mc=at.faf-c.de.-
    This is not suppose to be there, is it?
  • This URL comes from CMS cockpit, so we can't modify it.

+ we can fix the carpet-item-teaser errors regarding the wrong "data-teasertrackingid" element.

Hi Ruben

As far as I am aware this has so far been manually added to the target-link by Daniela Truttmann (Fact-Finder Business-Owner) to have a tracking-indication for that functionality.
As soon as the teaser-tracking for Fact-Finder Feedback-Campaigns (I have assigned you DISTRELEC-3415 as well in this regard) is fully and properly implemented, we can inform Daniela that she does not need to add the mentioned parameter via CMS any longer.

Next to the carpet-item-teaser errors I would like to ask you to investigate into every teaser-tracking implementation (please align with Dominic in this regard) and check whether all specified parameters are transmitted given an according behaviour (view, click etc.). As indicated e.g. so far Views are not yet properly tracked for the Hero-teaser items. If required you can set-up a meeting with Dominic and me (-> to be coordinated by Florian).

Thx Mark

Please estimate the effort.
Thx

Refactoring-scope of ticket according to the attached .xls-file.

Mark

As discussed I adapted the refactoring-scope of this ticket (compare attached .xls-file: Distrelec_Webtrekk_Teaser-Tracking-Implementierung_Overview_MDI_v1.1_14-08-27.xlsx).

Mark
Ruben, could you reestimate the ticket based on the change we have disccused with Mark Diggelmann.

Hello Mark,
please test after the next Q deployment
Thanks!

Hi Mark,

I have a question regarding the teaser / title click tracking of the product listing:

I assume, that the tracking should also work for products loaded by a click on the show more button or the technical switch buttons? Because so far we only implemented the tracking for products loaded by a standard page load and not by ajax..

BR Jan

Hi Jan

Thanks for your input. That's correct. The teaser-tracking shall be accordingly implemented for products loaded by Ajax.

Mark

Verified and tested today on test.distrelec.at (v2.0.25). Three remaining issues:

  • Product listings: The teaser-tracking shall be accordingly implemented for products loaded by Ajax (compare input from Jan Widmer above).
    On click (on image/title/table) the ct-request is triggered however with a wrong ID (e.g. '.770111.' -> required for .at: 'at.ons.770111.') and the click itself is not tracked so far.

http://test.distrelec.at/de/Galaxy-S4-active-I9295-schwarz-16-GB-Samsung-GT-I9295ZAA/p/11056417

  • Image-gallery: Upon click on a 'large' image no click-request is triggered so far.
  • Ähnliche Produkte / Zubehör: By clicking on the title the click is not tracked and the ct-request not triggered so far.

Please verify and refactor accordingly

Thx Mark
